thread.title: Beyonce Not Performing at Coachella on ‘Advice of Her Doctors,’ Fans Freak Out
thread.title_full: Beyonce Not Performing at Coachella on ‘Advice of Her Doctors,’ Fans Freak Out

title: Beyonce Not Performing at Coachella on ‘Advice of Her Doctors,’ Fans Freak Out
text:
Beyonce Not Performing at Coachella on ‘Advice of Her Doctors,’ Fans Freak Out February 23, 2017 @ 3:47 PM By Joyce Chen 
The Beyhive is buzzing. Beyoncé will no longer be performing at Coachella on the “advice of her doctors,” the music festival announced in a statement on Thursday, February 23. 
“Following the advice of her doctors to keep a less rigorous schedule in the coming months, Beyoncé has made the decision to forgo performing at the 2017 Coachella Valley Music & Arts Festival,” the Facebook statement reads . “However, Goldenvoice and Parkwood are pleased to confirm that she will be a headliner at the 2018 festival. Thank you for your understanding. Stay tuned for more information.” 6 Times Beyonce Slayed the Pregnancy Style Game 
Beyoncé was originally set to headline both of the festival’s Saturday nights, with Radiohead performing on Friday nights and Kendrick Lamar closing out the festival on Sunday nights. Other big-name talents on the lineup include Bon Iver , Lorde , The XX , Father John Misty , Gucci Mane and more. Beyonce during The 59th GRAMMY Awards at STAPLES Center on February 12, 2017 in Los Angeles, California. Christopher Polk/Getty Images 
The 35-year-old “Sorry” singer revealed that she and her husband, Jay Z , are expecting not one, but two, little additions to the family in a post to Instagram that went viral earlier this month. The beloved songstress went on to deliver a knock-out performance at the 2017 Grammys several weeks later, on Sunday, February 12.
